snowNotepad.title: Snow Notepad
snowNotepad.description: A mobile notepad developed in Flutter, using SQLite for managing user notes directly on their device and offline.

crimeBuster.title: CrimeBuster
crimeBuster.description: App for crime detection project in the IOT&AI Latin America 2023 competition, responsible for the graphical interface design.

polaris.title: Polaris Project
polaris.description: A website aimed at educating internet users about planets, with an interface that allows emulating a travel itinerary, project for the NASA Space Apps 2023 competition.

notepadWeb.title: Notepad: Web App
notepadWeb.description: A web notepad developed in Flutter, making requests to a personal API to implement all CRUD methods towards a MySQL database.

notepadAPI.title: Notepad: Rest API
notepadAPI.description: An API developed in Java Springboot to communicate the web notepad with a MySQL database.

chasing30.title: Chasing 30
chasing30.description: Console game of a board that moves around to find the number 30 while the board gets shuffled at regular intervals, designed as a challenge for the PyWeekend ESPOL 2023 competition.

snakeGame.title: Snake Game: Computer Society ESPOL Edition
snakeGame.description: Collaborative project leader of the classic Snake game, adapted and customized to the ESPOL environment, for its exhibition at the anniversary of the IEEE ESPOL student branch in 2023.
